name: System Compatibility
description: By researching and having your mech be rebuilt the systems your put in your mech lock in seamlessly causing you to have more space for even more systems.

name: Shock Shiled
description: Your mech gains extra padding and shielding against attacks that are meant to spread over an area rather than attack single targets

name: Super Heavy Overclocking
effect: You may use your superheavy weapon when you overcharge as a quick action but you roll your overcharge die again adding the additional heat. This does not trigger the next level of overcharge just the current level again.
description: HA’s R&D department has found a way to stress a mech’s reactor enough to allow it to fire a super-heavy rated weapon while overcharging. However, tests have shown that the limit of such a modification is typically twice every 10 hours for standard mechs, with more opportunities available if the pilot is skilled in engineering and has additional HA core modifications.
